parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether the player has the artillery computer currently open.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownArtilleryComputer'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>if ( '''shownArtilleryComputer''' ) then { hint "Artillery Computer shown on screen"; };
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableEngineArtillery]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[inRangeOfArtillery]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[getArtilleryETA]]
</value></part></template>
